B

buffer - 类 中的变量Scanner
 

C

check(char) - 类 中的方法Scanner
Check whether ch is a valid character.
cnt - 类 中的变量Scanner
 

E

expr() - 类 中的方法Parser
Method for non-terminal expr

G

getCount() - 类 中的方法Scanner
Get the number of token has been recognized.
getInput() - 类 中的方法Scanner
 
getNextToken() - 类 中的方法Scanner
Recognize next token from buffer.

I

isWrong - 类 中的变量Parser
Whether the expression is wrong

L

lookahead - 类 中的静态变量Parser
The next token

M

main(String[]) - 类 中的静态方法Postfix
 
match(int) - 类 中的方法Parser
Method for match.
missDigit() - 类 中的方法Parser
Handler for situation where a digit is expected but another kind of token is recognized.
missOperator() - 类 中的方法Parser
Handler for situation where an operator is expected but another kind of token is recognized.

N

nspace(int) - 类 中的方法Parser
Auxiliary function to generate the given number of spaces
nspace(int) - 类 中的方法Scanner
Auxiliary function to generate the given number of spaces.

P

Parser - <Unnamed>中的类
Parser with error recovery strategy that when parser encounter an unexpected token, it will discard all the following tokens until an expected one appear.
Parser() - 类 的构造器Parser
Constructor to initiate a scanner and get the first token for this parser.
Postfix - <Unnamed>中的类
Class with main method to start this program.
Postfix() - 类 的构造器Postfix
 
previous - 类 中的静态变量Parser
The previous token

R

res - 类 中的变量Parser
Postfix expression of the input expression
rest() - 类 中的方法Parser
Method for non-terminal rest.

S

scanner - 类 中的变量Parser
 
Scanner - <Unnamed>中的类
Scanner with basic lexical check.
Scanner() - 类 的构造器Scanner
Constructor to read input and put it into buffer.

T

term() - 类 中的方法Parser
Method for non'terminal term.
